item.title: Filecoin IPC actors
item.description: This project aimed to migrate Filecoin actors to EVM contracts. The live repository can be found here I personally worked on: Developing production-ready code using Solidity Unit testing the actors using foundry Optimizing code for on-chain gas efficiency
